title: Rugby star James Haskell's home is now available to rent on Airbnb
text:
From House Beautiful

British rugby player James Haskell is listing his countryside home in Northamptonshire on Airbnb during the upcoming Rugby World Cup — and there's no better place to watch the games than from his front room.

Fans of the rugby player will love the chance to spend the night in his stunning property, which he shares with his wife Chloe Madeley.

Situated in a quaint village in Northamptonshire, the spacious detached home is a 'country getaway' with two large bedrooms, a modern living room complete with a large-screen TV (perfect for viewing the rugby), a beautiful conservatory and pretty gardens.

One of our favourite rooms is the cream and gloss black kitchen (which gives you the best views of the garden). There's a large kitchen island, impressive coffee machine, double oven and plenty of storage cabinets. Don't be afraid to use all that's here: James wants guests to fully immerse themselves in his home.

James says: 'I am so thrilled to be offering a unique opportunity to fans in the UK who can’t make it all the way to Japan for the rugby.

'It has always been really important to Chloe and I that our house is a space that enables us to relax and spend quality time together, in between our busy lifestyles – we hope that guests will love it just as much as we do!'

Photo credit: Matt Alexander/Airbnb More

Photo credit: Matt Alexander/Airbnb More

Fans will also love having a nosy at James' memorabilia from his time on the England rugby team. From trophies to photos, these are sure to put a smile on everyone's face.

What should guests know before booking in? James and Chloe have a few house rules for those staying, including...

No pets

No smoking

Any chanting of the Haka will not be tolerated

No parties (unless England win the World Cup)

No tackling inside

Try to keep the space tidy

The listing is for two guests to stay on Friday 11th October - Sunday 13th October. Interested? Make sure you don't miss out...

We earn a commission for products purchased through some links in this article.
